name: Nama Bot Studio
description:
Create chatbots with Figma Components:


  1. Install the plugin and start easily by duplicating our Bot Studio Library Community File
  2. Run the plugin inside the Duplicated file
  3. Create a nama account; and safely
  4. Train AI for intent detection (request access)
  5. Publish the chatbot documented in the file
  6. Chat with the published bot
  7. Change the chat's color and other details with the NAMA.CHAT component.


Feel free to contact us with any questions, suggestions or feedbacks.


Have fun.
